articles.description: Taco Bell's Cheesy Fiesta Potatoes aren’t the only item coming back. The Quesalupa returns Thursday but Taco Bell Rewards members can buy it March 10.
articles.content:
Taco Bell testing Crispy Chicken Sandwich Taco in Nashville, Tennessee and Charlotte, North Carolina, ahead of nationwide debut later in 2021.
USA TODAY
